headline: Let me think of an example. Suppose the image has an article about a local event. The headline might be "Fiesta en el Parque Central", no subheadline, author is "Juan Pérez", and content talks about the event details. So the CSV row would look like: "Fiesta en el Parque Central"
author: Juan Pérez
content: La fiesta incluyó juegos y comida...
